unnormalised: Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Follower Analytics Get a Desi Twist!
normalised: Social Media and Influencer Marketing: Follower Analytics Get a Desi Twist!

unnormalised: Hey fam! Ever wondered if your Insta game is *actually* hitting the mark? Forget just counting likes, 'cause follower analytics are getting a major upgrade, especially for us here in Bharat.
normalised: Hey fam! Ever wondered if your Insta game is actually hitting the mark? Forget just counting likes, 'cause follower analytics are getting a major upgrade, especially for us here in Bharat.

unnormalised: Think beyond basic demographics! New tools are diving deep, like knowing how many followers in Kochi *really* dig your Onam recipes or if your biryani tutorial resonated more in Hyderabad than Lucknow.
normalised: Think beyond basic demographics! New tools are diving deep, like knowing how many followers in Kochi really dig your Onam recipes or if your biryani tutorial resonated more in Hyderabad than Lucknow.

unnormalised: Platforms are now offering insights into follower engagement during specific festivals and even analyzing sentiment towards regional languages in your content!
normalised: Platforms are now offering insights into follower engagement during specific festivals and even analyzing sentiment towards regional languages in your content!

unnormalised: "It's about understanding the nuances of the Indian audience," says Rohan Verma, a digital marketing guru from IIT Delhi. "Knowing that 70% of your audience prefers Hindi captions over English, for example, can be a game-changer."
normalised: "It's about understanding the nuances of the Indian audience," says Rohan Verma, a digital marketing guru from I I T Delhi. "Knowing that seventy percent of your audience prefers Hindi captions over English, for example, can be a game-changer."

unnormalised: This means more targeted campaigns, better ROI, and less throwing money into the void. So ditch the guesswork and embrace the power of data. Your next reel could be a viral sensation, thanks to these analytics. Think of it as your digital Kundali matching you with the right followers!
normalised: This means more targeted campaigns, better R O I, and less throwing money into the void. So ditch the guesswork and embrace the power of data. Your next reel could be a viral sensation, thanks to these analytics. Think of it as your digital Kundali matching you with the right followers!
